DOC.brief_summary: This is a study of the effect of consumer-directed financial incentives on completion of advance care planning among Medi-Cal patients.
DOC.brief_title: Consumer Engagement to Increase Advance Care Planning: Patient Randomization
DOC.detailed_description: Older adults receiving primary care from one of three clinics contracting with Partnership HealthPlan of California, a multi-county Medi-Cal managed care plan will be mass randomized to receiving educational materials regarding advance care planning with or without a financial reward for completing advance care planning.
DOC.criteria: Partnership HealthPlan of California enrollee Receipt of primary care from one of 3 participating clinics (Ole, Petaluma, West County) Age > 65 > 75
